title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention -  Support for Advanced classification scanning and protection for Endpoints running on Mac OS
description: With this capability, admins can now extend Advanced classification support to Mac Endpoints as well. Advance Classification scanning and protection allows the more advanced Microsoft Purview cloud-based data classification service to scan items, classify them and return the results to the local machines. This means admins can take advantage of classification techniques like fingerprinting, exact data match classification and named entities in their DLP policies. Currently available in GA for Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention, we're introducing the ability to extend Advance Classification support to Mac endpoint devices for Government Clouds.
